snippet.title: ARY AND THE SECRET OF SEASONS | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow the journey of a young girl named Ary across the magnificent world of Valdi! Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/935570/Ary_and_the_Secret_of_Seasons/

To the surprise of many, Ary has joined the Guardians of Seasons, an old organization traditionally ruled by men. Her task: successfully restore the seasons of Valdi! With strength, determination, and self-control as her pillars, Ary will set out to accomplish a feat no other guardian has ever managed.

Ary can summon small spheres that act as tiny ecosystems for each season, changing the environment within completely. The spheres can be opened up three at a time; thus, Ary can jump from winter to summer to autumn in a single leap, solving environmental puzzles and unleashing the secret of seasons!

Ary and the Secret of Seasons arrives on PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Steam in 2020.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/935570/Ary_and_the_Secret_of_Seasons/
Learn more: http://www.ary-game.com
Like on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ArySeasons
Follow on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/ArySeasons
